text: Antz World Sports is a sports game developed by M4 Limited and published by L.S.P for the Game Boy Color platform. Antz World Sportz was never released in the United States, it was instead only released in European countriesin 2001 and is based on the film of the same name. == Description == Meet the Antz World Sportz challenge, and experience the excitement of ant-thlete sportz - down to the tiniest detail! \- Meet your favourite Antz characters once again: Z, Princess Bala, Weaver and General Mandible will all be joining the games! \- 8 world-class sportz activities designed on an insect scale for the Antz colony, including a 100 millimetre race, cotton swab javelin throw, Antz-style street skating and the wild termite "bull-riding" rodeo, plus many others just waiting to be discovered. == Other websites == * https://gamefaqs.gamespot.com/gbc/945362-antz-world-sportz * https://www.mobygames.com/game/antz-world-sportz * https://www.giantbomb.com/antz-world-sportz/3030-36310/ * https://wowroms.com/en/roms/nintendo-gameboy-color/antz-world-sportz- europe/10492.html * https://romspure.com/roms/nintendo-game-boy-color/antz- world-sportz/ * https://archive.org/details/antzworldsportz Category:2001 video games Category:Game Boy Color games Category:Game Boy Color-only games Category:Sports video games Category:Simulation video games
title: Antz World Sportz
